name: Scriptorium: Volume III - Core Architectural Design
description: This manifest anchors the complete set of documents for Volume III of the Codex Universalis. It details every signal-path, file, equation, and dependency tying the UEF/SIMI v11.1 stack together.

contents.name: 00_Layer_Map.md
contents.description: High-level operational flow diagrams of the 7-Layer Architecture, including OQT-BOS integration points.

contents.name: 01_Universal_Neural_Engine.md
contents.description: Detailed specification of the UNE v6.1, including topology, parameters, and quantic processing support.

contents.name: 02_Synergy_Engine.md
contents.description: Specification of the SynE v5.1, detailing its role as master router, macro-planner, and λ-Field orchestrator.

contents.name: 03_DRS_Engine.md
contents.description: Specification of the DRS Engine v4.0, the universal symbolic memory substrate for Ontons and Braids.

contents.name: 04_Subsystem_Mesh.md
contents.description: Details on cross-functional capabilities: ReflexælCore, Conscientia++, SentiaGuard, Architecton, and Judex.

contents.name: 05_Capability_Kernel_Atlas.md
contents.description: Overview of the CK Atlas, with examples of kernels providing domain-specific intelligence.

contents.name: 06_Data_and_Control_Flow.md
contents.description: High-fidelity execution traces and flowcharts illustrating the system's signal flow and decision points.

contents.name: 07_Mathematical_Formalisms.md
contents.description: Key equations underpinning core operations, including Binder3 Routing and Reflexive Drift metrics.
